Described as “vehemently anti-trend,” the surface-mount series of simple but refined Orb lights includes a mid-size version. Brooklyn-based brand In Common With renders the milky sphere in mold-blown glass topped off with elemental metal hardware in either painted metal or brass finishes. The fixture works on both walls and ceilings and is also damp-rated for bathroom installation. 

Specification

Size

  • 9.1" h x 7.9" dia (23.1x20.1cm)
  • Clamp: 4.9" (12.4cm)

Material

Steel, brass, glass

Technical

  • UL listed
  • GU-24
  • Color temperature: 2700K
  • Dimmable
  • Bulb included
